thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 30 of 227
thread.title: Danielle

author: Danielle
title: Danielle
text: I ordered my living room set and bedroom dressers from there. Wish we were able to pick the tables amd lamps we liked when we purchased our set instead of it only having the one option. Delivery and financing wirh Gardner White is great though. No complaints there. Being able to track the delivery instead of wasting an entire day at home waiting is awesome.
